request.description: Allows users to submit a piece of an address string and have the API respond with the best possible options

response.name: Success

originalRequest.description: Allows users to submit a piece of an address string and have the API respond with the best possible options

request.description: Takes addresses in multiple different formats and returns the address in the PackageX address mode.

response.name: Success

originalRequest.description: Takes addresses in multiple different formats and returns the address in the PackageX address mode.

request.description: Updates a single item. When updating inventory, you increment and decrement quantities by passing in positive and negative integers. Lastly, you can optionally provide a layout value to be more specific about the item's exact whereabouts in that location

originalRequest.description: Updates a single item. When updating inventory, you increment and decrement quantities by passing in positive and negative integers. Lastly, you can optionally provide a layout value to be more specific about the item's exact whereabouts in that location

request.description: Gets a single item
Gets all items
deletes a single item
To create a manifest, you only need to include the location_id and specify the inventory items that you want to add.

originalRequest.description: To create a manifest, you only need to include the location_id and specify the inventory items that you want to add.

request.description: Before you can update a manifest, you'll need to update its status to accepted. When all items have been verified, you are able to update the status of the manifest to 'completed'.

originalRequest.description: Before you can update a manifest, you'll need to update its status to accepted. When all items have been verified, you are able to update the status of the manifest to 'completed'.

request.description: Gets a single manifest
Gets all manifests

There are three pieces of information we require to get rates: sender, 
recipient, and parcel. There are also some additional options you can 
pass in to configure the shipment.

request.description:
After you already fetched rates, you can also fetch new rates. You'll want to do this if:
  - Your rate has expired because the rates_generated_at is more than 15 minutes from now.
  - You want to update your options that you added into the shipment.
Lists shipments up to the specified limit starting at the specified page
Retrieves a specific shipment
